mapper.select:
select bmc.id, bmc.expiry_begin_date as expiryBeginDate, bmc.expiry_end_date as expiryEndDate, bmc.receive_type as receiveType, bc.* from bu_member_coupon bmc,bu_coupon bc where bmc.coupon_id = bc.id and bmc.member_id = #{memberId} and bmc.del_flag = '0'
and bmc.status = '1' and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day)
and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date <= now() and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day)
and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date > now()
order by bmc.id desc
limit #{currentPage} , #{pageSize}

select count(*) from bu_member_coupon bmc,bu_coupon bc where bmc.coupon_id = bc.id and bmc.member_id = #{memberId} and bmc.del_flag = '0'
and bc.rang = '1'
and bc.rang != '1'
and bmc.status = '1' and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day)
and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date <= now() and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day)
and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date > now()

select bmc.id, bmc.expiry_begin_date as expiryBeginDate, bmc.expiry_end_date as expiryEndDate, bmc.receive_type as receiveType, bc.* from bu_member_coupon bmc,bu_coupon bc where bmc.coupon_id = bc.id and bmc.member_id = #{memberId} and bmc.del_flag = '0'
and bc.rang = '1'
and bc.rang != '1'
and bmc.status = '1' and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day)
and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date <= now() and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day)
and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date > now()
order by bmc.rec_date desc limit #{offset} , #{fetchSize}

select count(*) from bu_member_coupon bmc left join bu_coupon bc on bmc.coupon_id = bc.id where bmc.member_id = #{memberId} and bmc.del_flag = '0'
and bc.rang = '1'
and bc.rang in ('2','3')
and bc.rang = '4'
and bmc.status = '1' and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day)
and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date <= now() and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day)
and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date > now()

select bmc.id, bmc.expiry_begin_date as expiryBeginDate, bmc.expiry_end_date as expiryEndDate, bmc.receive_type as receiveType, (select max(mcl.create_date) from bu_member_coupon_log mcl where mcl.member_coupon_id = bmc.id and bmc.status = '1' and mcl.log_type = '1' and mcl.del_flag = '0' ) useDate, bmc.is_give as isGive, bc.* from bu_member_coupon bmc left join bu_coupon bc on bmc.coupon_id = bc.id where bmc.member_id = #{memberId} and bmc.del_flag = '0'
and bc.rang = '1'
and bc.rang in ('2','3')
and bc.rang = '4'
and bmc.status = '1' and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day)
and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date <= now() and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day)
and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date > now()
order by bmc.rec_date desc limit #{offset} , #{fetchSize}

select sum(unUsedCoupon) unUsedCouponCount,sum(usedCoupon) usedCouponCount,sum(expiredCoupon) expiredCouponCount from( select count(*) as unUsedCoupon, 0 as usedCoupon, 0 as expiredCoupon from bu_member_coupon bmc join bu_coupon bc on bmc.coupon_id = bc.id where bmc.member_id = #{memberId} and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date > now() and bmc.del_flag = '0'
union all
select 0 as unUsedCoupon, count(*) as usedCoupon, 0 as expiredCoupon from bu_member_coupon bmc left join bu_coupon bc on bmc.coupon_id = bc.id where bmc.member_id = #{memberId} and bmc.status = '1' and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day) and bmc.del_flag = '0'
union all
select 0 as unUsedCoupon, 0 as usedCoupon, count(*) as expiredCoupon from bu_member_coupon bmc left join bu_coupon bc on bmc.coupon_id = bc.id where bmc.member_id = #{memberId} and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date <= now() and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day) and bmc.del_flag = '0' ) t

select sum(case c.rang when 1 then 1 else 0 end) as platformCouponCount,sum(case c.rang when 1 then 0 else 1 end) as notPlatformCouponCount from bu_member_coupon bmc left join bu_coupon c on bmc.coupon_id = c.id where bmc.member_id = #{memberId} and bmc.del_flag = '0' and bmc.status = '0'and bmc.expiry_end_date > now()

select sum(case c.rang when 1 then 1 else 0 end) as platformCouponCount, sum(case c.rang when 2 then 1 when 3 then 1 else 0 end) as areaCouponCount, sum(case c.rang when 4 then 1 else 0 end) as shopCouponCount from bu_member_coupon bmc left join bu_coupon c on bmc.coupon_id = c.id where bmc.member_id = #{memberId} and bmc.del_flag = '0' and bmc.status = '0'and bmc.expiry_end_date > now()

select mc.id memberCouponId,mc.expiry_begin_date expiryBeginDate,mc.expiry_end_date expiryEndDate, c.`name` couponName ,c.money,c.minimum from bu_member_coupon mc LEFT JOIN bu_coupon c on mc.coupon_id=c.id where mc.del_flag='0' and c.del_flag='0' and mc.member_id=#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and c.activity_area_id=#{activityAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and mc.expiry_begin_date <= SYSDATE() and mc.expiry_end_date >= SYSDATE() and c.`status`='1' and mc.`status`='0'

SELECT mc.id memberCouponId, mc.expiry_begin_date expiryBeginDate, mc.expiry_end_date expiryEndDate, c.`name` couponName, c.money, c.minimum, c.preferential_type as preferentialType, c.discount, c.minicount, c.condition_type AS conditionType, c.max_discount_money AS maxDiscountMoney FROM bu_member_coupon mc LEFT JOIN bu_coupon c ON mc.coupon_id = c.id WHERE mc.del_flag = '0' AND c.del_flag = '0' AND mc.member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND c.mcht_id = #{mchtId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mc.expiry_begin_date <= SYSDATE() AND mc.expiry_end_date >= SYSDATE() AND mc.`status` = '0' AND c.rang = '4' AND c.coupon_type != '4'

select bmc.id, bmc.coupon_id as couponId, bmc.expiry_begin_date, bmc.expiry_end_date, bc.rang, bc.name, bc.money, bc.minimum, bc.coupon_type as couponType, bc.type_ids as typeIds, bc.can_superpose as canSuperpose, bc.preferential_type, bc.discount, bc.max_discount_money, bc.condition_type, bc.minicount, bc.care_shop_can_rec, bc.definition_prefix from bu_member_coupon bmc,bu_coupon bc where bmc.coupon_id = bc.id and bmc.member_id = #{memberId} and bmc.status = 0 and bmc.del_flag='0' and bc.rang='1' and bc.coupon_type in ('1','2','3') and bc.del_flag='0' and bmc.expiry_end_date >= now() order by bc.money desc
select count(1) from bu_coupon_exchange_code ex,bu_member_coupon mc where ex.member_coupon_id = mc.id and ex.del_flag = '0' and mc.del_flag = '0' and mc.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT mc.id, c.money, c.minimum FROM bu_member_coupon mc, bu_coupon c WHERE mc.coupon_id = c.id AND c.del_flag = '0' AND c.coupon_type = '4' AND C.type_ids = #{productId} AND mc.del_flag = '0' AND mc.`status` = '0' AND mc.expiry_begin_date <= NOW() AND mc.expiry_end_date >= NOW() AND mc.member_id = #{memberId} order by c.money desc,mc.id desc

select bmc.id, bmc.coupon_id as couponId, bc.rang, bc.name, DATE_FORMAT(bmc.expiry_begin_date,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as expiryBeginDate, DATE_FORMAT(bmc.expiry_end_date,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as expiryEndDate, bc.money, bc.minimum, bc.coupon_type as couponType, bc.type_ids as typeIds, bc.can_superpose as canSuperpose, (select pt.name from bu_product_type pt where pt.del_flag = '0' and pt.id = bc.type_ids) as productTypeName, '限时抢购、新人专享、积分抵扣等不可用' as content from bu_member_coupon bmc left join bu_coupon bc on bmc.coupon_id = bc.id where bmc.member_id = #{memberId} and bmc.status = 0 and bmc.del_flag='0' and bc.rang='1' and bc.del_flag='0' and bc.status='1'
and bc.coupon_type = 1
order by bc.money desc

select * from( select bmc.id, bmc.expiry_begin_date as expiryBeginDate, bmc.expiry_end_date as expiryEndDate, bmc.receive_type as receiveType, bc.rang, bc.name, bc.money, bc.minimum, bc.activity_area_id, bc.mcht_id, bc.type_ids, bc.coupon_type, bc.can_superpose, area.source, area.templet_suffix, area.name as activityAreaName, area.type as activityAreaType, (select activity.id from bu_activity activity where activity.activity_area_id = area.id and activity.del_flag = '0' limit 1) as activityId, bmc.rec_date from bu_member_coupon bmc join bu_coupon bc on bmc.coupon_id = bc.id join bu_activity_area area on area.id = bc.activity_area_id where bmc.member_id = #{memberId} and bmc.del_flag = '0'
and bmc.status = '1' and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day)
and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date <= now() and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day)
and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date > now()
and bc.del_flag = '0' and bc.activity_area_id is not null and bc.status='1' and area.del_flag = '0'
union all
select bmc.id, bmc.expiry_begin_date as expiryBeginDate, bmc.expiry_end_date as expiryEndDate, bmc.receive_type as receiveType, bc.rang, bc.name, bc.money, bc.minimum, bc.activity_area_id, bc.mcht_id, bc.type_ids, bc.coupon_type, bc.can_superpose, '' as source, '' as templet_suffix, '' as activityAreaName, '' as activityAreaType, null as activityId, bmc.rec_date from bu_member_coupon bmc join bu_coupon bc on bmc.coupon_id = bc.id where bmc.member_id = #{memberId} and bmc.del_flag = '0'
and bmc.status = '1' and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day)
and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date <= now() and bmc.expiry_end_date >= date_add(now(), interval -180 day)
and bmc.status = '0' and bmc.expiry_end_date > now()
and bc.del_flag = '0' and bc.activity_area_id is null and bc.status='1' ) a order by a.id desc
limit #{currentPage} , #{pageSize}

select c.id, (select count(1) from bu_member_coupon mc where mc.member_id = #{memberId} and mc.coupon_id = c.id and ( (c.rec_limit_type = 1 and mc.create_date >= #{startOfCurrentDay}) or c.rec_limit_type = 2 or c.rec_limit_type = 3 or (c.rec_limit_type = 4 and mc.create_date >= #{startOfCurrentMonth}) ) and mc.del_flag = '0') as qty from bu_coupon c where c.id in
#{id}
